title: The Twelfth Messiah: The Awakening
description: Eli Vex has Awakened into The Twelfth Messiah. Reluctant at first, Eli realizes that he must forget about his beliefs and train to master his new powers to defend the universe from The Darkness, a race of beings bent on destroying existence. Time is of the essence as the deadly and merciless beings of The Darkness make their way to Earth. To keep Earth safe from The Darkness, Eli must activate three of The Ten Temples of Balance located on Earth. However, the longer he is in contact with The Darkness, the more his inner darkness surfaces. Eli will have to face his own demons and balance himself if he wishes to survive. Eli has a long journey ahead of him but all will be lost if he fails. Will Eli be consumed by his inner darkness or will he succeed?
author: Jordan Elias Shanbrom
